item.title: VibeMeter 1.0 Beta 2
item.description:
VibeMeter 1.0 Beta 2

Pre-release version

Second beta release of VibeMeter with improvements and refinements based on initial feedback.

Features

  • 🎯 Multi-Provider Architecture - Ready for future AI service integrations
  • 💰 Real-time Spending Tracking - Monitor monthly spending with live updates
  • 🚨 Smart Notifications - Configurable warning and upper spending limits
  • 💱 Multi-Currency Support - Convert spending to your preferred currency
  • 🔄 Automatic Updates - Built-in Sparkle framework for seamless updates
  • 🔐 Secure Authentication - WebKit-based OAuth with Keychain storage
  • 📊 Menu Bar Integration - Native macOS experience with animated gauge

Supported Services

  • Cursor AI - Complete integration with teams, invoices, and usage data
